title: Help with a survey for Indian Flyers! Please indulge.
selftext:
Hi All,

Posting this here as we specifically need Indians to fill the survey form!

Our team is conducting a survey regarding airport baggage handling and services and we need input from Indian flyers (Whether you fly domestic or International).

Kindly requesting you to fill this form: [https://forms.gle/soU3RThQVuXeMVTF6](https://forms.gle/soU3RThQVuXeMVTF6)

It will not take more than 5 minutes!

Any suggestions can be provided in the form itself or here as comments too!

Thanks in advance.
